Package net.evmodder.EvLib.extras

Class ReflectionUtils.RefClass

java.lang.Object
net.evmodder.EvLib.extras.ReflectionUtils.RefClass
Enclosing class:
ReflectionUtils
public static class ReflectionUtils.RefClass extends Object
RefClass - utility to simplify work with reflections.
